software.name: Visual Studio Code

software.description: Atom is a hackable text editor built on Electron, with support for Git and extensive customization via packages, popular among developers.

software.description: Sublime Text is a fast, lightweight text editor with powerful features like multiple cursors and a vast plugin ecosystem, widely used by developers.

software.name: Emacs

software.description: Eclipse is a robust IDE primarily for Java, with extensive plugin support for C++, Python, and other languages, widely used in enterprise development.

software.name: Qt Creator

software.name: Light Table

software.name: MariaDB

software.name: SQLite

software.name: Cassandra

software.name: Redis

software.name: Elasticsearch
software.description: Elasticsearch is a distributed search and analytics engine, ideal for indexing and querying large datasets.

software.name: Apache HBase

software.description: CouchDB is a NoSQL database with a focus on ease of use and replication, storing data in JSON documents.

software.name: ArangoDB

software.name: Neo4j
